text: Septimiu Cǎlin Albuț (born 23 May 1981) is a Romanian footballer who plays as a goalkeeper for 1. FC Gloria Bistrița. In his career Albuț also played for teams such as: FC Baia Mare, ACF Gloria Bistrița, FCM Târgu Mureș, Rapid București or Săgeata Năvodari, among others."U" Cluj intră în Liga 3 cu 400.000 de euro, bani de la Primărie. Sabău: "Vrem promovarea. Goga, Giurgiu şi Abrudan rămân. Vin Albuţ, Onicaş şi Ursu. Bugetul e asigurat deja" ==References== == External links == * * Category:Living people Category:1981 births Category:People from Bistrița Category:Romanian footballers Category:Association football goalkeepers Category:Liga I players Category:Liga II players Category:CS Minaur Baia Mare (football) players Category:ACF Gloria Bistrița players Category:ASA 2013 Târgu Mureș players Category:FC Rapid București players Category:AFC Săgeata Năvodari players Category:FC Viitorul Constanța players Category:CS Gaz Metan Mediaș players Category:FC Botoșani players Category:FC Universitatea Cluj players
title: Călin Albuț
